architectural_elements.name: Glass Walls and Ceiling
architectural_elements.description: Large glass panes framed by rusted iron, many cracked or covered in grime and creeping vines.

architectural_elements.name: Iron Framework
architectural_elements.description: Delicate yet corroded metal beams supporting the structure, some bent or fractured.

architectural_elements.name: Stone Pathway
architectural_elements.description: Broken stone tiles leading through the room, overgrown with moss and tangled roots.

architectural_elements.name: Fountain Basin
architectural_elements.description: A dried-up fountain in the center, filled with stagnant water and fallen leaves.

architectural_elements.name: Large Windows
architectural_elements.description: Tall, fogged windows letting in faint moonlight, distorted by condensation and dirt.

furniture_and_decor.name: Planting Tables
furniture_and_decor.description: Wooden tables cluttered with cracked pots, rusted tools, and withered plants.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wicker Chairs
furniture_and_decor.description: Old garden chairs covered in mildew, one toppled over as if hastily abandoned.

furniture_and_decor.name: Watering Can
furniture_and_decor.description: A rusted metal can lying on its side, dripping brown water onto the floor.

furniture_and_decor.name: Clay Pots
furniture_and_decor.description: Broken and scattered pots containing long-dead or mutated plant life.

furniture_and_decor.name: Trellis and Vines
furniture_and_decor.description: A decaying wooden trellis overtaken by thorny vines and creeping ivy.

atmospheric_details.name: Overgrown Foliage
atmospheric_details.description: Wild plants and ferns sprawling across the floor and walls, some still unnaturally green.

atmospheric_details.name: Dripping Water
atmospheric_details.description: Condensation falling from the ceiling or leaves, echoing through the quiet space.

atmospheric_details.name: Creeping Fog
atmospheric_details.description: A soft mist rolling along the ground, thickest near the fountain.

atmospheric_details.name: Insects and Moths
atmospheric_details.description: Small insects circling the light sources or resting on leaves and windows.

atmospheric_details.name: Decay Smell
atmospheric_details.description: A heavy, earthy scent of rot and damp soil, occasionally broken by floral sweetness.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Lantern
interactive_objects.description: A fallen lantern near the fountain, its glass cracked but still faintly glowing.

interactive_objects.name: Mysterious Seedling
interactive_objects.description: A small, glowing sprout growing in an old pot, pulsing faintly as if alive.

interactive_objects.name: Garden Journal
interactive_objects.description: A water-damaged notebook on a table, filled with notes on plant experiments and strange rituals.

interactive_objects.name: Locked Cabinet
interactive_objects.description: A metal storage cabinet secured with a rusted padlock, emitting faint rattling sounds from inside.

interactive_objects.name: Shattered Glass Panel
interactive_objects.description: A broken section of the ceiling, letting in rain and leaves — possibly an entry point for creatures.

environmental_effects.name: Fluttering Curtains
environmental_effects.description: Tattered fabric blowing in the cold air, whispering against the glass walls.

environmental_effects.name: Shifting Shadows
environmental_effects.description: Plant silhouettes moving unnaturally, as though responding to unseen forces.

environmental_effects.name: Faint Whispers
environmental_effects.description: Soft voices hidden beneath the sound of rustling leaves.

environmental_effects.name: Glowing Spores
environmental_effects.description: Tiny bioluminescent particles floating near certain plants, pulsating gently.

environmental_effects.name: Creeping Vines Movement
environmental_effects.description: Vines that twitch or slowly crawl when the player isn’t watching.

lighting.name: Moonlight Through Glass
lighting.description: Cold blue light filtering through the cracked panes, refracting across the wet floor.

lighting.name: Lantern Light
lighting.description: A dim, flickering lantern casting long shadows over the foliage.

lighting.name: Bioluminescent Plants
lighting.description: Faint, organic light emitted by certain unnatural plants in the far corners.

lighting.name: Lightning Flashes
lighting.description: Occasional lightning bursts illuminating the greenhouse through the windows.
